_sText:
1 minute + ~ Stafe map I put together in the space of about a week and a half.   My only real goal with this map was that I wanted to make something visually pleasing that would be fun for both beginners and experienced bhoppers. You can reach some very high speeds in this map and it's possible to skip a tonne of platforms if you're good.  Also has a neat bonus inspired by surf_illumination b3.

Map named after some random weeb I met in the bhop community.
